comments.author: cpearce@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Comment on attachment 8754670
MozReview Request: Bug 1274486 - Disable D3D11 for more igd* DLLs - r?cpearce

Approval Request Comment
[Feature/regressing bug #]: D3D11 crashes in 47+
[User impact if declined]: many crashes per week in beta 47.
[Describe test coverage new/current, TreeHerder]: No new try as it's just a pref change adding more DLLs.
[Risks and why]: Only a pref change that adds some DLLs; Tiny risk in disabling too many DLLs, but we're falling back to proven D3D9, so it's not so bad.
[String/UUID change made/needed]: None.

Requires uplift of bug 1257028, bug 1273691, bug 1274115, bug 1274127, bug 1274132, bug 1273504, bug 1255732, bug 1271163 first.
comments.author: gsquelart@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Comment on attachment 8754670
MozReview Request: Bug 1274486 - Disable D3D11 for more igd* DLLs - r?cpearce

Let's uplift this to Aurora48 to stabilize it before uplifting to Beta47.
comments.author: rkothari@mozilla.com

Comment on attachment 8754670
MozReview Request: Bug 1274486 - Disable D3D11 for more igd* DLLs - r?cpearce

Disable D3D11 for some device drivers, this code stabilized on Aurora over the weekend, Beta47+
comments.author: rkothari@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Signature igd10iumd32.dll@0x8f3a8 is still happening (on startup) in Firefox 47.0b99: https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/signature/?product=Firefox&uptime=%3C%3D60&version=47.0b99&signature=igd10iumd32.dll%400x8f3a8&_columns=date&_columns=product&_columns=version&_columns=build_id&_columns=platform&_columns=reason&_columns=address&_columns=uptime&page=1

Is it a different crash? Should we file a new bug for it?
comments.author: mcastelluccio@mozilla.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Marco Castelluccio [:marco] from comment #10)
> Signature igd10iumd32.dll@0x8f3a8 is still happening (on startup) in Firefox
> 47.0b99:
> https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/signature/
> ?product=Firefox&uptime=%3C%3D60&version=47.0b99&signature=igd10iumd32.
> dll%400x8f3a8&_columns=date&_columns=product&_columns=version&_columns=build_
> id&_columns=platform&_columns=reason&_columns=address&_columns=uptime&page=1
> 
> Is it a different crash? Should we file a new bug for it?

We disabled D3D11 by default in Fx47 in 47.0b9. If this is showing up in RC, it might be because users are deliberately turning on D3D11 (override pref to on). Just wondering!
comments.author: rkothari@mozilla.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Marco Castelluccio [:marco] from comment #10)
> Signature igd10iumd32.dll@0x8f3a8 is still happening (on startup) in Firefox
> 47.0b99:
> https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/signature/
> ?product=Firefox&uptime=%3C%3D60&version=47.0b99&signature=igd10iumd32.
> dll%400x8f3a8&_columns=date&_columns=product&_columns=version&_columns=build_
> id&_columns=platform&_columns=reason&_columns=address&_columns=uptime&page=1
> 
> Is it a different crash? Should we file a new bug for it?

Spot checking a few crash reports, it does not appear that video is playing in these crashes. So this must not be related to hardware accelerated video decoding.
comments.author: cpearce@mozilla.com

comments.text: ergo, you should file a new bug.
comments.author: cpearce@mozilla.com
